feed.title: m4rcix
feed.subtitle: *in my best possible Obi-Wan Kenobi impression* Hello there! My name is Marci(x) and my intrests are, to name a few: cybersecurity, videogames, speedrunning. In this blog I will mostly write about my studies, CTFs I attended, challenges I solved, and probably anything else I feel like writing about. If you want, feel free to check out my socials, if you wanna contact me, feel free to do so on Discord, Twitter, etc. Happy reading! :)
